message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it worth the price. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11,000?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm not quite ready to accept $10,500. How about we split the difference and go with $11,250? This would be a good compromise for both of us. Let me know if you're open to it.
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $11,250. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. Can you meet me at that price?
